caseTitle: Asaf Fasihuddin Khan v. Govt. of Pakistan and others
tagline: The appointment of Air Marshal (r) Khalid Chaudhry as Director General, Civil Aviation Authority has been made in a non-transparent manner. Further, contracts awarded for construction and completion of New Benazir Bhutto International Airport Project, Islamabad to 17 contractors and their subsequent performance as noted in the Inquiry Report and Audit Report is not transparent.
